Name: Bigger Bikes
About the game: Bigger Bikes is a game about riding bikes, in off-road conditions. The gameplay is based on realistic bike control and funny physics. Be careful! You can go into a skid, roll over or fly into a ditch at any time. Overcome difficult mountainous and hilly terrain, ride light or take a load with you, look for the safest route so as not to roll over and lose the delivery. Features Five vehicles Realistic bike control Fascinating mountain landscapes Hardcore, based on physics
